chat: Carlos Gomez
Hey Isabella, I really enjoyed our conversation about Maya Angelou's poetry. I was thinking maybe we could start brainstorming ideas for our collaboration project tonight?
Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Carlos, that sounds like a great idea! I'm looking forward to brainstorming ideas with you tonight.
Carlos Gomez
I was thinking maybe we could meet at The Rose and Crown Pub tonight to discuss the project further?
Isabella Rodriguez
That sounds like a great plan! I'll see you at The Rose and Crown Pub tonight at 7pm.
Carlos Gomez
Great! I'll see you tonight at The Rose and Crown Pub at 7pm.
